Anson Writes

Programming the Arduino

Posted on 05 Feb 2009
uC Hobby has an excellent article on programming on the Arduino platform. I have a particular interest in this since I own and program one of this suckers for fun. Check it out if you're interested in learning about microcontroller programming! The Arduino is a great (and cheap) starting point.
